well for some reason your OS cannot see the drive,  I would start with very basic steps... make sure all the cables are plugged in fully
then after you've ensured its connected ok, i would try to work from that.

on a side note, often a good way to find out what to make an fstab entry is to mount the device manually then do cat /etc/mtab and it will show you the current settings.  Often you can just copy paste that into fstab
